title: trying2hire
author: trying2hire
content: I am looking to hire an experienced designer that is competent with HTML/CSS (Specifically TailwindCSS) as well as working with Git for cohesion between front-end designing and back-end development. Please send me a private message if you meet this criteria, ability to provide samples of past work is very important.Thank you

comments.author: sr22398
comments.body: Hello,Hope you are doing well.reach me at seth(@)cisinlabs(dot) comThanksSeth R
